content: Are there any tools/templates/utilities that work to create a CapabilityStatement, well-known/smart-configuration or documentation of the FHIR endpoints from an existing FHIR server?

Keep in mind that it's a /.well-known/smart-configuration file (no .json suffix -- there is a spot in our intro where we accidentally wrote ".json" but http://hl7.org/fhir/smart-app-launch/conformance/index.html has the formal details + docs; there's an example you can use as a template.
Grahame's FHIR toolkit provide some support for authoring CapabilityStatement
and custom tooling exists for more advanced rendering supporting Restful Interactions.
